short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial Jisho.org extension, to look up Japanese words and kanji on the fly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jisho.org is an online Japanese dictionary, Jisho On The Fly makes it accessible directly on the page.

_____________________________
WORD DEFINITIONS

Select some Japanese or English text, then "right click > Jisho On The Fly > Look Up Definition" or on the keyboard "CTRL + SHIFT + Y"

_____________________________
KANJI

Kanji information includes: meanings, readings, JLPT level and strokes order.

Select some text containing one or more kanji, then "right click > Jisho On The Fly > Look Up Kanji" or on the keyboard "CTRL + Y".

_____________________________
KANJI PRACTICE SHEET

Once you have looked up some kanji, you will be able to generate a printable practice sheet based on your history.


Source code: https://github.com/9elt/Jisho
